submission:
class Solution:
    def minChanges(self, nums: List[int], k: int) -> int:
        d = [0] * (k + 2)
        n = len(nums)
        for i in range(n // 2):
            x = abs(nums[i] - nums[n - i - 1])
            d[0] += 1
            d[x] -= 1
            d[x + 1] += 1
            mx = max(max(nums[i], nums[n - i - 1]), k - min(nums[i], nums[n - i - 1]))
            d[mx + 1] += 1
        ans, cnt = math.inf, 0
        for i in range(k + 1):
            cnt += d[i]
            ans = min(ans, cnt)
        return ans
